website_summaries.verdict: Top-of-the-line alkaline water machine that produces the most advanced ionization while being a sleek addition to your kitchen.
pros: Built-in carbon filter lasts up to a year (4,000 liters) and removes common pollutants found in water
Easy installation and small size fits nicely on kitchen counter
Outstanding customer service from a highly reputable company
cons: Water can taste worse after filtering depending on your source water

customer_reviews.title: All around good product and competent, friendly, most helpful support from company.
customer_reviews.text: Deluxe 9.0. Easy to install under sink installation kit. Helpful, friendly, well-informed helpline to company. We love the taste of the water. Going on one year and recently changed the filter after arriving at 4000 liter usage. We find improved general health. We use the mineral filter as our water source is a deep well. We are totally positive about this product and the company behind it. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Just received this. Very simple to hook up. There is also a video to help, didn't need it. Water flows strong so people saying slow flow must have not installed correctly. Did get PH strips to test and is getting better. (Close to 7). My wife, son daughter and I love the taste. All in all very happy and loving this product
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hudak

customer_reviews.title: High quality, nice design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use, efficient, looks pretty and elegant , nice design. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Works well, except putting on the tap adapter, can be a pain in the butt
customer_reviews.author: KEITH P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for negative ions mine just makes the water taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for negative ions mine just makes the water taste real funny like charcoal taste
customer_reviews.author: Bob A.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ionizer because of the beneficial effect of alkaline water on the body and the great value of this machine for the functionality. What we didn’t know is that there are tons of additional uses for both alkaline and acidic water. High alkaline water removed a stain from our couch that we couldn’t remove with any cleaner. The 3.0 acidic water We have used for facial cleansing and it has greatly diminished wrinkles. There are so many more uses that we’re discovering. Absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: GT2030

customer_reviews.title: The best investment this year
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves it! So glad we invested in this machine! We were buying alkaline water from the store. This is the real deal. You really are going to feel better!
customer_reviews.author: Seneca Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water. Didn't feel health benefits.
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes great. It eliminates the faint chlorine smell from city water. It's also good for making ice tea. I mix a little high pH water with my wine to neutralize it, which prevents a stomach ache. I haven't felt any special health benefits from the ionized water although my wife swears by it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy setup and it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Saving$$$ on purified water. Not hard to setup either. Buy the undersink connection.
customer_reviews.author: Quarrelman

customer_reviews.title: Water purifier
customer_reviews.text: I love the performance and love my fresh clean alkalized water! I had a question when I first started using the device and the owner was right there with an explanation....very happy
customer_reviews.author: Louise M. Goldsberry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed !!! I would give it zero stars if I could. After installing it the water tasted exactly the same and I noticed hard water marks in the kettle so I purchased a drinking water test and compared to the test from our top water. The result came out exactly the same. I wasted my time and money with it as it is so not working as advertised. I just don't understand where the positive reviews came from... Started my return process today.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and excellent customer service support.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product on 03/01/2018 and so far it is a great product. I took measurement of the PH and it has been as described it. I used to purchase water all the time no to mention the trips to the store. The customer service is first class, they provide support in anything, and always a quick respond. I completely recommend this product for your health and your safe time and money when purchasing water. Excellent SUPPORT and Warranty for LIFE!
customer_reviews.author: Juan M Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect PH
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product 4 years ago and very satisfied. I had previously purchased a cheaper unit and it did not work as well. The PH controls are very accurate. Used a seperate tester to confirm. Acidic water works well for my plants. Daily drinking setting provides a perfect PH. I am able to use with reverse osmosisis system. I recently had a problem after owning the product 4 years and they stood by their lifetime warranty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very bad machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine called garbage. They say that the filter last for 5000 L but after 900 L it stopped working. I had to pay to mail it in to be repaired and then 400 L after I got it back it stopped working again. It does not maintain the pH levels after it has been used for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sheats

customer_reviews.title: Think Before You Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Hello! Connected after a reverse osmosis system. Two months worked fine, then the problems started. I turned to the buyer, it's been three days. he never answered me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Alkaline vs costco water
customer_reviews.text: This product will alkaline your water equivalent to costco alkaline water level. The color is light purple on the alkaline spectrum. This equals to 10 - 11. The different level of alkaline from machine settings turn out that they all give you the same level which is around 10 to 11. Water taste fine. I am ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, did the test and is good water,taste great. I will write later after results.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water !
customer_reviews.text: I love it for Teh drinking water, my wife loves it for washing her face and hair. I was not a believer before, I certainly am now !! Great quality, easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Best 9 plate & Best price
customer_reviews.text: Love the Aqua Life 9 plate ,great tasting water!! David was extremely helpful & made it so easy to install ,5 minutes to be exact . get it best price anywhere I checked Jon L. Henderson NV.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with Aqua-Ionizer Deluxe 9 Plate Alkaline Water
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with Aqua-Ionizer Deluxe 9 Plate Alkaline Water. I am getting the best water for my body with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like this water ionizer
customer_reviews.text: We like this water ionizer. It was easy to set up and is easy to use. No problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Shinn

customer_reviews.title: It works GREAT the best alkaline water machine out there
customer_reviews.text: It works GREAT the best alkaline water machine out there. It's amazing what alkaline water can do for the body, plants, cleaning the house & the pets love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Paul Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Small and fits on the counter well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above the call of duty service!!
customer_reviews.text: We received our Aqua Ionizer and were right away impressed with the quality of the unit. We began to install it and ended up calling the service number that they send offering help. Morgan took our call and gave us help beyond what we expected.! The Air Water Life company is very dedicated to their products and customers. Morgan listened and explained (plumbing stuff with my husband) he ended up sending us parts for free to instal it as we wanted to! Now we sleep better, skin is bright- we feel we have made a great decission. I will probably order the 3 stage filters to add even more heath features. Bonnie
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Air Water Life Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.0 is great
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best in the market. Already have used this for 3 months it is designed very well. Easy to hook up and use it. it is compact in size to place it on Kichen or Bathroom or Wetbar counters. Alkaline level stays consistent at 9.0. It cleans up the plates every few gallons of alkaline water is drawn which is a cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: moosethemoose

customer_reviews.title: ... we purchased the Aqua-lionizer deluxe we have been very satisfied. Support has called us to see if we ...
customer_reviews.text: We have seen the Kegan machine but since we purchased the Aqua-lionizer deluxe we have been very satisfied. Support has called us to see if we had any questions and gave us their number for any future questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Water
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little system. I wish it came with a better filtration system. But I plan on connecting it to my old water filter and then it will be great. We're very happy overall with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Coy H.

customer_reviews.title: water taste better
customer_reviews.text: the family have been drinking ionized alkaline and purified water for many years now. when it was time to change the unit, this Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.0 is the best find for the money. it was very easy to install even without reading instructions. i love the design wherein the machine cleans itself briefly after each use and after several liters of water used the machine plays a tune and cleans itself again with housecleaning acidic water. highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: locokicker

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating customer service
customer_reviews.text: I wish I were enjoying this right now, but 2 months after my purchase, I'm still trying to find an adapter that fits my faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Adair

customer_reviews.title: I have acid reflux and have been looking into electricelyzed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have acid reflux and have been looking into electricelyzed reduced water. We were comparing to the Kangan water. I have just found out that our machine only produces -270 ORP. Which is positive but still not nearly close enough to what is advertised. I am sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The product is great! But the Customer Service is just amazing
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! But the Customer Service is just amazing! After 2 year that I bought the product, I needed help and Mason was just awesome. He solved the issue and everything is fine now! Thanks Mason for your wonderful and professional work
customer_reviews.author: Victor Amaro

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses for water:  cleaning veggies, skin and improved drinking water
customer_reviews.text: My husband is handy so installation was not bad at all. If i had to do it, it still wouldn't be done. Drinking ionized water takes some getting used to. You have to take it slow b/c it does mess with your digestion and gave me headaches the first week. We researched ionized water and it gave us a lot of tips not included with machine, such as don't drink ionized water for 2 hours after eating or it could mess with your digestion- good to know!! Please with features of unit such as chemical free cleaning for counters and floors, setting for cleaning hair and skin are great also.
customer_reviews.author: chris h

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Knowing very little about there purifiers i was confused. I spoke to Mason at Aqua and he EDUCATED me on the process, he did not try to SELL me. What a relief! So i went with his product (i did the under mount which came out great) and Mason guided me through the set up and the many questions i had after. Some of the best customer service i have ever experienced. Highly recommend this product and family company.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tranovich

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with my Water Ionizer system
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my Water Ionizer system! There are several out there to choose from however this one does a great job and it's not as pricey as the others! Besides you are quaranteed to get the help you need from Mason or David. They will stay on the phone with you until your issue or concern is resolved. They are both very patient and kind! I highly recommend this company and this water unit! I love it! Janine from Texas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these item from Air Water Life after receiving a lot of good and reliable information from Zack Raucher. He gave me a very professional advice and was very helpful from the first time we spoke until I got my product delivered. Thanks Zack .
customer_reviews.author: ALDO OLCESE

customer_reviews.title: this is the only water we drink now.
customer_reviews.text: We read from a lot health books that we really need a water that can provide us with good PH level, but all of them cost an arm and a leg. We found Air Water Life Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.0 browsing online and the price is good. We bought it and so far my wife notice that she can sleep better. I noticed also that my skin looks better. I ordered from Mason and he is very helpful. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Great water and great price
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. We had a different faucet-based water ionizer and the computer kept breaking every time we got it wet. We finally had to you get a new one, and this one was the best price with the highest ratings. We are pleased with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: I Like My Water Ionizer
customer_reviews.text: “I am really enjoying the water unit. Its “small frame” is perfect for my kitchen and it is definitely a value for its price. The water that is produced by the unit is exceptional and healthy. .. one of my best investments.”
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing ionizer. My brother owns a Kangen unit, but I'm glad we purchased this instead, plus the company (Mason Hendricks) is super helpful with my questions. If you ever think about owning one, this is MUST have!
customer_reviews.author: Johanne W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: We love our new machine. We had a venus for over eight years and when it had an internal leak we were glad to have found this company. Especially the fact you dont have to change the water flow to control ph output. This one produces 9.5 ph constantly. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Binyam

customer_reviews.title: Whole family health
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the whole family! My teeth feel so clean! Good for gut health too!
customer_reviews.author: The NEWEST Mrs. Devor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and the best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had other ionizers, but this is clearly superior! You can add easy-to-install filters to it for fluoride and other elements. Any time I have a question, they are easy to contact, are cheerful and helpful and go way beyond regular customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Warren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and product
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this water filter and after 6 years of faithful service it developed a small leak in the bottom. I called customer service. He told me to pack it up and send it back they would fix it. In a very short time I received it back. It was a new one, or maybe a repaired one. Whatever it was it looked like brand new. These people stand behind their product. So aside from being an excellent water filtration system at an affordable price, they have a lifetime guarantee. Highly recommend all their products.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn G. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: it got better but still was not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to have alkaline water and Ionized antioxidant water. I have well water and the Ph level is 9.2, I could still tell he difference in the water. It was smoother and more refreshing. I measured the ORP for the daily drinking and it was not to my liking so I called them and they asked me to try different things, it got better but still was not satisfied. The gentleman sent me a mineral filter free of charge, I installed it and the ORP dropped. The product is great and customer service is second to none, they really want you to be happy with their product and stand behind it.
customer_reviews.author: JYG

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I have been enjoying the great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I have this Aqua Ionizer deluxe 9 for 2 years now. My wife and I have been enjoying the great tasting water, my acid reflux is gone. My wife uses the water for cooking rice, brewing coffee, beef stew, Wow!!! the taste is so delicious!!!.The Real Spirit Company is so amazing; and so with the customer service especially Mason Hendricks who is so very customer oriented, I’ll give him 100% job customer satisfaction. I will recommend this product and Real Spirit Company to my friends, relatives. They are honest and very reliable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Gatchalian

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great! I love having ionized water available at all ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great! I love having ionized water available at all times! The cleaning water is just an extra bonus. And it was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Moore

product_meta.title: Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 9.0 Aqua-Ionizer Pro Alkaline Water Ionizer Machine
feature_bullets: HAPPY, HEALTHY & HYDRATED: Alkaline Water may help detoxify the body, increase energy & hydration
MORE THAN DRINKING WATER: 7 water settings allow you to adjust the alkalinity & add antioxidants
FILTRATION AT ITS FINEST: Advanced filtration technology purifies & ionizes over 4000 liters
ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY: Ionizer reduces waste from plastic water bottles
-110 VOLTS Only - Undersink kit available- Antioxidant potential -860 ORP

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
